sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Note">83f60c3e1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbaa</category> <github_id>39</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/39</github_url> <message>If you leave the Run As field as blank in scheduled job, ServiceNow will run the job as system user.</message> <number>TIL0001032</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-16 16:00:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d1c5d3fd1b3894108ed631d7dc4bcbc7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>Default Scheduled Job Execution</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
